00036 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_CLASS

00038 #include <linux/version.h>
00039 #include <linux/vfs.h>
00040 #include <obd_class.h>
00041 #include <lprocfs_status.h>

00043 #include "mdc_internal.h"

00045 #ifdef CONFIG_PROC_FS
00046 static int mdc_active_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)
00047 {
00048         struct obd_device *dev = m->private;
00049 
00050         LPROCFS_CLIMP_CHECK(dev);
00051         seq_printf(m, "%d\n", !dev->u.cli.cl_import->imp_deactive);
00052         LPROCFS_CLIMP_EXIT(dev);
00053         return 0;
00054 }
00055 
00056 static ssize_t mdc_active_seq_write(struct file *file,
00057                                     const char __user *buffer,
00058                                     size_t count, loff_t *off)
00059 {
00060         struct obd_device *dev;
00061         int rc;
00062         __s64 val;
00063 
00064         dev = ((struct seq_file *)file->private_data)->private;
00065         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00066         if (rc)
00067                 return rc;
00068         if (val < 0 || val > 1)
00069                 return -ERANGE;
00070 
00071         /* opposite senses */
00072         if (dev->u.cli.cl_import->imp_deactive == val)
00073                 rc = ptlrpc_set_import_active(dev->u.cli.cl_import, val);
00074         else
00075                 CDEBUG(D_CONFIG, "activate "LPD64": ignoring repeat request\n",
00076                        val);
00077 
00078         return count;
00079 }
00080 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(mdc_active);
00081 
00082 static int mdc_max_rpcs_in_flight_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)
00083 {
00084         struct obd_device *dev = m->private;
00085         __u32 max;
00086 
00087         max = obd_get_max_rpcs_in_flight(&dev->u.cli);
00088         seq_printf(m, "%u\n", max);
00089 
00090         return 0;
00091 }
00092 
00093 static ssize_t mdc_max_rpcs_in_flight_seq_write(struct file *file,
00094                                                 const char __user *buffer,
00095                                                 size_t count,
00096                                                 loff_t *off)
00097 {
00098         struct obd_device *dev = ((struct seq_file *)file->private_data)->private;
00099         __s64 val;
00100         int rc;
00101 
00102         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00103         if (rc)
00104                 return rc;
00105 
00106         if (val < 0 || val > UINT_MAX)
00107                 return -ERANGE;
00108 
00109         rc = obd_set_max_rpcs_in_flight(&dev->u.cli, val);
00110         if (rc)
00111                 return rc;
00112 
00113         return count;
00114 }
00115 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(mdc_max_rpcs_in_flight);
00116 
00117 
00118 static int mdc_max_mod_rpcs_in_flight_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)
00119 {
00120         struct obd_device *dev = m->private;
00121         __u16 max;
00122 
00123         max = obd_get_max_mod_rpcs_in_flight(&dev->u.cli);
00124         seq_printf(m, "%hu\n", max);
00125 
00126         return 0;
00127 }
00128 
00129 static ssize_t mdc_max_mod_rpcs_in_flight_seq_write(struct file *file,
00130                                                     const char __user *buffer,
00131                                                     size_t count,
00132                                                     loff_t *off)
00133 {
00134         struct obd_device *dev =
00135                         ((struct seq_file *)file->private_data)->private;
00136         __s64 val;
00137         int rc;
00138 
00139         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00140         if (rc)
00141                 return rc;
00142 
00143         if (val < 0 || val > USHRT_MAX)
00144                 return -ERANGE;
00145 
00146         rc = obd_set_max_mod_rpcs_in_flight(&dev->u.cli, val);
00147         if (rc)
00148                 count = rc;
00149 
00150         return count;
00151 }
00152 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(mdc_max_mod_rpcs_in_flight);
00153 
00154 
00155 static int mdc_rpc_stats_seq_show(struct seq_file *seq, void *v)
00156 {
00157         struct obd_device *dev = seq->private;
00158 
00159         return obd_mod_rpc_stats_seq_show(&dev->u.cli, seq);
00160 }
00161 
00162 
00163 static ssize_t mdc_rpc_stats_seq_write(struct file *file,
00164                                        const char __user *buf,
00165                                        size_t len, loff_t *off)
00166 {
00167         struct seq_file *seq = file->private_data;
00168         struct obd_device *dev = seq->private;
00169         struct client_obd *cli = &dev->u.cli;
00170 
00171         lprocfs_oh_clear(&cli->cl_mod_rpcs_hist);
00172 
00173         return len;
00174 }
00175 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(mdc_rpc_stats);

00193 static int mdc_obd_max_pages_per_rpc_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)
00194 {
00195         return lprocfs_obd_max_pages_per_rpc_seq_show(m, m->private);
00196 }
00197 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO(mdc_obd_max_pages_per_rpc);
